top_comments.comment: There was so, so much hype in the US for the DD. They made it seem like it'd be a PC grade add on with Zelda. Huge maps and features and graphics etc. Then it just didn't happen and we all bought PS2s and Xboxes lol.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Bless you Uncle Derek, and Producer Grace. You always seem to show up with new and great content just when I need it. ♥️
Derek, where did you get that awesome shirt?!

There was so, so much hype in the US for the DD. They made it seem like it'd be a PC grade add on with Zelda. Huge maps and features and graphics etc. Then it just didn't happen and we all bought PS2s and Xboxes lol.
No way...u ain't no nerdy looking Chinese spectacle wearing simcity snes mayor
The only thing I was missing as a Kid was the N64DD. XD

Would "Dumbest Hidden Features" become a series? Like every video is a long winded explanation of a very obscure very niche game feature that requires tons of peripherals...i want that i want more of it.
You know you can turn the camera right?
Looks like your tweet about Ocarina on the Switch went viral. bud :)
Man, it would be really cool if at any time this N64DD games came back on the NSO Service. (I mean, its fun to think about it)
Please show us more of your DDs!
Please show me F-zero track creator Uncle Derek, I'll be forever grateful.
